text: Wix.com is a freemium online platform that allows users to create websites and Facebook pages. It competes with Webs, Weebly, Yola and other web hosting and creation sites. ==History== Wix was created in 2006 by Avishai Abrahami, Nadav Abrahami and Giora Kaplan. The company is located in Tel Aviv, with offices in San Francisco, New York City and Dnepropetrovsk.List of Wix features It is funded by investors Insight Venture Partners, Mangrove Capital Partners, Bessemer Venture Partners and Benchmark Capital. It entered open-beta in 2008. ==References== Category:Websites established in 2006 Category:Companies of Israel Category:Software companies
title: Wix.com
